Reviews.Title: Wireless Waterproof Snake PSI camera
Reviews.Author: crafty
Reviews.Content: The Camera has been somewhat helpful and does what is expected to do. The learning curve is huge, do to the lack of detailed instruction. I also purchased a 3 ft extension which fits in the lid of the case perfectly. Recommend manufacture/sales outlet put up a web site with detailed instructions for use of its product(s)(video preferred).

Reviews.Title: Monitor Quit Working
Reviews.Author: outblue
Reviews.Content: Initially worked fine but after several uses the monitor quit working, mounted or not.  Completely dead, and would not take a charge.  I checked and the power cord was supplying power.  I liked the unit well enough that I would have swapped out the nonworking monitor for another one, but that's not how the system worked and I had to return the entire unit for the seller to check it out.  No problem dealing with the seller though I was told I only had a couple of weeks to return the unit for a refund.  I purchased my unit shortly before Christmas and the deadline may have been for Christmas gift returns regardless of any problem.  It may be that with the dead monitor the seller would have taken the unit back after the deadline.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: This product is great for Kenwall Waterly searching great for drains great for toilet holes all and all a very great product

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Gerald L Spears
Reviews.Content: I love this inspection camera, I am a Cat5 cable installer, and this thing has more than paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: cool!
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: was uncertain if it fit the snake extension I ordered, since they shipped from 2 sources, but amazon was right, they work just fine together. I use it for electric work. I stuff a weighted string in the wall hole for the switch/receptacle I cut in, then go in the basement and use the monitor & camera hook to grab my weighted string through a 3/4" hole. The removable monitor works fine through floors, just as long as you are within 30' of the transmitting camera.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof snake
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Demik
Reviews.Content: So fare I hqave used this a few times while working on my truck. I have also used it to view inside my attic soffets for wire routing.this item has so many uses and I would reccommend it. I have not yet used it in a water application.

ProductInfo.Features:
This innovative new inspection tool allows for easy visual inspections in hard-to-reach areas, even in total darkness or under water
Its comfortable pistol grip design and forward facing controls make it easy to detect and diagnose the unreachable
The Snake Sewer Inspection Camera provides solutions whenever and wherever you need them
Mini water-proof camera with 1m(3") flexible extended tube,2.5 TFT-LCD wireless monitor with rechargeable Li-battery
Waterproof Level: IP67 with Underwater,Night Vision Range:1.5m,Lightweight
ProductInfo.Name: Wireless Waterproof Snake Plumbing Sewer Inspection Camera with 2.5 TFT-LCD Color removeable LCD Monitor come with Easy Carrying Storage Box "
